headline: Managed Services Market to Grow from $430 Billion in 2026 to $704 Billion by 2031: Strategic Analysis of IBM, Cisco Systems, Fujitsu, AT&T, HPE and Other Key Players
summary: Dublin, Jan. 21, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Managed Services - Market Share Analysis, Industry Trends & Statistics, Growth Forecasts (2026-2031)" has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering. The global managed services market is on track to reach a significant milestone, with projections estimating its value at USD 430.56 billion by 2026, up from USD 390.21 billion in 2025. By 2031, the market is expected to expand further to USD 704.2 billion, achieving a compound annual growth rate
